sentences.en: A mid - ocean ridge a boundary between plates where new lithospheric material is injected from below s.
sentences.cn: 一道中海脊是板块之间的边界,在那里新的岩石圈的物质从下部注入.

sentences.en: A mid-ocean ridge is a boundary between plates where new lithospheric material is injected from below.
sentences.cn: 一道中海脊是板块之间的边界，在那里新的岩石圈的物质从下部注入。

sentences.en: A mid-ocean ridge is a boundary between plates where new lithospheric material is injected from belows.
sentences.cn: 一道中海脊是板块之间的边界，在那里新的岩石圈的物质从下部注入。

sentences.en: In the case of sufficiently young chasmic basins high heat flows are due to lithospheric cooling.
sentences.cn: 这种相当年轻的裂陷盆地的高热流是由岩石圈冷却所引起的.

sentences.en: Since the size of the Earth is essentially constant, new lithosphere can be created at the mid-ocean ridges only if an equal amount of lithospheric material is consumed elsewhere.
sentences.cn: 因为地球的大小本质上是不变的，只有同等数量的岩石圈物质在其它地方被吞没，新的岩石圈才能生成。

sentences.en: The existence and movement of large lithospheric plates seems well established.
sentences.cn: 巨大岩石圈板块的存在与位移似乎已完全确定了.

sentences.en: This convection process causes the lithospheric plates to move, albeIt'slowly.
sentences.cn: 对流过程导致岩石层版块缓慢移动,这就是我们所熟知的板块移动.

sentences.en: This paper reviews previous researches on lithospheric extension and uranium metallogenesis in South China since Mes.
sentences.cn: 文章详细总结了华南中生代以来岩石圈伸展作用和铀成矿作用的研究进展.
